org.opends.server.monitors

Class DatabaseEnvironmentMonitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opends.server.api.MonitorProvider<MonitorProviderCfg>
      • org.opends.server.monitors.DatabaseEnvironmentMonitor

  • public class DatabaseEnvironmentMonitor
extends MonitorProvider<MonitorProviderCfg>
    A monitor provider for a Berkeley DB JE environment. It uses reflection on the environment statistics object so that we don't need to keep a list of all the stats.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      DatabaseEnvironmentMonitor(java.lang.String name, RootContainer rootContainer)
      Creates a new database environment monitor.

        Specified by:
        initializeMonitorProvider in class MonitorProvider<MonitorProviderCfg>
        Parameters:
        configuration - The configuration to use to initialize this monitor provider.
        Throws:
        ConfigException - If an unrecoverable problem arises in the process of performing the initialization.
        InitializationException - If a problem occurs during initialization that is not related to the server configuration.

      • getMonitorInstanceName

        public java.lang.String getMonitorInstanceName()
        Retrieves the name of this monitor provider. It should be unique among all monitor providers, including all instances of the same monitor provider.
        Specified by:

        Returns:

      • updateStats

        public void updateStats(SearchFilter searchFilter,
               long matchingEntries)
        Updates the index filter statistics with this latest search filter and the number of entries matched by the index lookup.
        Parameters:
        searchFilter - The search filter that was evaluated.
        matchingEntries - The number of entries matched by the successful index lookup.
